amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit benefits under the livestock feed program for losses which could have been covered under the crop insurance program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to prohibit the use of funds appropriated in the bill to be used for salaries to provide assistance to livestock producers if crop insurance protection on the farm is available to the producer but not used.

action.text: On agreeing to the Olver amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 248 (Roll No. 549).
